summary: The 'Expanding Access for Online Veteran Students Act' (H.R. 3753) aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code concerning veterans' education benefits.  The bill seeks to increase the monthly housing stipend for veterans enrolled in programs of education delivered solely through distance learning, specifically those studying on more than a half-time basis, under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program. The amendments would go into effect August 1, 2025.
